snippet: FISHMAN--Edna, died peacefully at home on February 15th, at age 100. She was a lifelong New Yorker, a beloved daughter, sister and cousin, and a valued friend to multiple generations. She lived a fully engaged and independent life on her own terms, and will be missed by all who knew her. Funeral services will take place at Plaza Jewish Memorial, 630 Amsterdam Avenue at 91st Street, Thursday, February 18th at 11:00. 1/3
